CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function addClickFn does not sanitize the input parameters 'color', 'colorName', and 'colorbox'. This could potentially lead to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks if the input parameters contain malicious scripts. An attacker could inject scripts that can manipulate the DOM or steal sensitive information.
